Removed_Other.name: FFlagDisableFullscreenToastWhenNotPointer_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Disables fullscreen notifications when a pointer device is not detected.
Removed_Other.purpose: Reduces distractions for players using non-pointer devices, improving gameplay experience.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagEnableAudioTremolo_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Activates a sound effect that modulates audio volume to create a tremolo effect.
Removed_Other.purpose: Adds a richer audio experience in games, making sounds more dynamic and engaging.

Removed_Input.name: FFlagEnableEmbeddedGamepadCheck_Staged
Removed_Input.mechanism: Enables automatic detection of gamepad connections within the game.
Removed_Input.purpose: Improves gameplay experience by allowing seamless gamepad use without manual setup.

Removed_Input.name: FFlagGamepadPreferredWhenKeyboardPending_Staged
Removed_Input.mechanism: Prioritizes gamepad input when keyboard input is not ready.
Removed_Input.purpose: Provides a smoother gaming experience for players using gamepads.
